mutants.code:
def calculate_offense_ways(test_cases):
    MOD = 10 ** 9 - 7
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, max_numbers) = case
        max_numbers.sort()
        ans = 1
        for i in range(n):
            ans *= max_numbers[i] - i
            ans %= MOD
            if ans == 0:
                break
        results.append(ans)
    return results
